description: Dashboard for viewing opentel metrics from P2G

targets.expr:
(increase(docker_container_cpu_used_total{job = "homeservices-docker", name = "p2g"}[30s]) / increase(docker_container_cpu_capacity_total[30s])) > 0 
or (increase(docker_container_cpu_used_total{job = "homeservices-docker", name = "p2g"}[1m]) / increase(docker_container_cpu_capacity_total[1m])) > 0 
or (increase(docker_container_cpu_used_total{job = "homeservices-docker", name = "p2g"}[3m]) / increase(docker_container_cpu_capacity_total[3m])) > 0 
or (increase(docker_container_cpu_used_total{job = "homeservices-docker", name = "p2g"}[5m]) / increase(docker_container_cpu_capacity_total[5m]))

title: Peloton To Garmin
